name: Sumo Survivor
description:
Survive as long as you can in a sumo arena with endless enemies and decreasing strength. Learn to budget your strength between offense and defense. Your score is determined by how long you last in addition to how many sumos you knock out. Keep on the lookout for items to replenish your strength (Fun fact: Sumo wrestlers love beer).

Controls

WASD/Arrow Keys - move

Space - push

R - restart

M - menu

Credits

Art, Coding, Design - Kevin Dravet

Music - "Duel" (Dark Cloud, 2000) by Tomohito Nishiura

SFX - Soundbible

Font - 1001 Free Fonts
